Properties ​

border ​

border: Vector2 | null = null

Defined in: Engine/Camera2D.ts:46

Cria uma borda invisivel na janela que move a camera quando o target tenta ultrapassa-la

Example ​

ts
horizontal = 200
vertival = 200
camera.border = new Vector2(horizontal, vertical)

bounds ​

bounds: { height: number; width: number; x: number; y: number; } | null = null

Defined in: Engine/Camera2D.ts:38

Limita o mapa em que a camera pode se mover em um retangulo

Example ​

ts
camera.bounds = {
   .   x: 0,
   .   y: 0,
   .   width: 1600,
   .   height: 600
   }

height: number

Defined in: Engine/Camera2D.ts:28

Altura da camera

learpFactor ​

learpFactor: number = 5

Defined in: Engine/Camera2D.ts:20

Velocidade em que a camera se aproxima do target

position: Vector2

Defined in: Engine/Camera2D.ts:9

Example ​

target ​

target: GameObject | null = null

Defined in: Engine/Camera2D.ts:16

Objeto que será seguido pela camera

Example ​

ts
const player = new Player(...)
camera.target = player
